RPGXplorerObject.Name: Assassin's Dagger
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +1 on DC of Fortitude save forced by Death Attack of an Assassin.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Dagger of Venom
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Once per day wielder can use Poison (as per Spell) on creature struck.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Dwarven Thrower
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +2 warhammer that can be thrown. +3 and Returning for Dwarves. Deals extra damage when thrown.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Flametongue
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +1 flaming burst longsword. Once per day, wielder can use 30ft fire ray touch attack that deals 4d6 fire damage.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Frost Brand
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +3 frost greatsword that provides 10 resistance to Fire damage and other abilities.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Holy Avenger
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +2 cold iron longsword. Becomes +5 holy weapon for Paladin and other abilities.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Life-Drinker
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +1 greataxe. Bestows 2 negative levels on target when damage is dealt and 1 on wielder unless undead or a construct.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Luck Blade
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +2 shortsword. +1 on all saving throws. Once per day can reroll any roll.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Luck Blade (1 Wish)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +2 shortsword. +1 on all saving throws. Once per day can reroll any roll. Can use Wish once.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Luck Blade (2 Wishes)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +2 shortsword. +1 on all saving throws. Once per day can reroll any roll. Can use Wish twice.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Luck Blade (3 Wishes)
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +2 shortsword. +1 on all saving throws. Once per day can reroll any roll. Can use Wish three times.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Mace of Smiting
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +3 adamantine heavy mace. +5 vs. constructs and critical destroys. Critical deals x4 to outsiders.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Mace of Terror
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +2 heavy mace. Upon command can transform wielder into illusion of darkest horror.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Nine Lives Stealer
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +2 longsword. Has the power to draw life force from an opponent.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Oathbow
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +2 comp longbow (+2). +5 and deals extra 2d6 vs. sworn enemy. Additional rules.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Rapier of Puncturing
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +2 wounding rapier. Can make touch attack 3 times per day that deals 1d6 CON damage.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Shatterspike
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +1 longsword. Adds +4 to sunder opposed roll and 1d8+4 to sunder damage.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Shifter's Sorrow
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +1/+1 silvered two-bladed sword. Extra 2d6 damage vs. shapechangers.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Sunblade
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +2 sword. +4 vs. Evil. Deals double damage and crit x3 against negative plane creatures/undead. Sunlight power.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Sword of Life Stealing
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +2 black iron longsword bestows 1 negative level when it deals a critical hit. Wielder gains 1d6 temporary HP each time that last for 24 hrs.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Sword of the Planes
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +1 longsword on the Material Plane. Enhancement varies according to plane.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Sword of Subtlety
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +1 shortsword. +4 on attack and damage rolls when using Sneak Attack.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Sylvan Scimitar
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +3 scimitar. When used outdoors in a temperate climate grants wielder Cleave and deals 1d6 extra damage.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Trident of Fish Command
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +1 trident. Grants ability to charm up to 14HD of aquatic animals.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Trident of Warning
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +2 trident. Wielder can determine location of aquatic predators within 680ft.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Slaying Arrow
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +1 arrow. If it strikes target creature of specified type then they must make DC20 Fortitude save or die.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Slaying Arrow, Greater
RPGXplorerObject.Description: +1 arrow. If it strikes target creature of specified type then they must make DC23 Fortitude save or die.

RPGXplorerObject.Name: Sleep Arrow
RPGXplorerObject.Description: Converts damage to non-lethal. Target must make DC 11 Will save or fall asleep if struck.
